content.text: fML-3 (Formula Math Library - Form 3) is an interactive mathematics learning platform designed for Form 3 students. It combines precise calculations with AI-powered explanations to help you understand not just the answers, but the reasoning behind them.
Every calculation comes with a conversational explanation that describes what the problem asked for, which formula was applied, and how the answer was obtained.

items: Choose a chapter from the sidebar
Enter your values in the input fields
Click the solve button to see results
Read the explanation below each answer
Try the AI Assist for natural language questions

content.title: Ch 1-2: Relations + Functions
content.description: Domain, range, inverse relations, quadratic equations, and function behavior. Learn to plot functions and find turning points.

content.title: Ch 3: Statistics
content.description: Mean, median, mode, grouped data analysis, and statistical visualizations. Master central tendency and data interpretation.

content.title: Ch 4: Rates + Variations
content.description: Direct variation, inverse variation, and practical rate problems. Understand proportional relationships.

content.title: Ch 5: Sequences + Series
content.description: Arithmetic progressions, geometric progressions, and compound interest. Calculate terms and sums efficiently.

content.title: Ch 6: Circles
content.description: Arc length, sector area, chord properties, and circle geometry. Solve real-world circular problems.

content.title: Ch 7: Earth as Sphere
content.description: Great circles, small circles, haversine distance, and navigation. Calculate distances on Earth's surface.

content.title: Ch 8: Accounting
content.description: Balance equations, assets, liabilities, and capital calculations. Understand basic accounting principles.

content.title: AI Assist
content.description: Natural language math solver with detailed explanations and reasoning. Ask questions in plain English.

content.text: The AI Assist feature allows you to ask math questions in natural language and receive detailed, step-by-step explanations.

items: Go to Settings tab
Enter your Groq API key
Click 'Save Key'
Return to AI Assist tab

content.text: Be specific! Include all numbers, units, and what you want to find.
Calculate compound interest on $5000 at 6% for 3 years
Find the 10th term of an AP with first term 5 and common difference 3

items: Brief: A conversational summary of what was solved
Detailed: Step-by-step breakdown with formulas and calculations
Always include units in your inputs (km, $, degrees, etc.)
Double-check your values before solving
Read the explanations to understand the process
Try different values to see how formulas behave
Use the example questions as templates
Enter: Send message in AI Assist
Shift+Enter: New line in AI Assist
Tab: Navigate between input fields

content.text: If AI Assist isn't working, check that you've saved your API key in Settings.

items: Refresh the page if calculations seem stuck
Clear your API key and re-enter it if you get errors
Check your internet connection for AI features
Make sure you're using valid numbers in input fields

content.text: fML-3 is designed with privacy in mind. Here's what you need to know:

items: All calculations happen in your browser
Your API key is stored locally only
No data is sent to external servers except Groq API
No tracking or analytics are implemented
You can clear your API key anytime

content.text: Your API key is stored in browser localStorage. Anyone with access to your computer can potentially view it.

items: Don't share your API key with others
Use a separate API key for this app
Clear your key when using shared computers
Monitor your API usage on Groq Console
